AdGear – Montreal, Canada – Full Time - Analytics Developer

AdGear is a fast-growing digital advertising technology company. We provide software and services for publishers, advertisers and media agencies.

As a hybrid between back-end software developer and data scientist, you will build tools to stream, process, monitor and analyze event logs, which you will then use to develop forecast models to inform our ad decisioning processes.

You should apply if this describes you:

- Formal training in statistics. Ideally, experience with R, APL/J/K, Julia, or similar.

- Proficient working with databases. Ideally, experience with columnar stores or OLAP cubes.

- Ideally, experience working with Hadoop, Cassandra, Kafka, Storm, or large datasets in general.

Check out http://adgear.com/company/careers/#AnalyticsDevMontreal for more details.
